comments.content:
I just have a suggestion for OpenStreetMapViewItemizedOverlayWithFocus.

It's now possible to show a description text in a toolbox.

It would be nice to have coordinates of this toolbox.

So it would possible to make this toolbox clickable.

I did for me and use it already in my application. If you are interested in, I would send you my codesnipplet.

Ps.
Sorry if it's wrong place to publish such messages. You can remove it
Hi Neil, sorry for a silly question, but how do I do that? I'm not a svn expert

Or if it's only a change to one file, then you could just attach the new version.

But actually it's very easy to create a patch - if you have TortoiseSVN then just right-click on the root folder and select "Create patch" from the context menu.  If you use something else instead of TortoiseSVN then it should be equally simple.

Ok. There are two patches.

The first is for itemized overlay with focus

Another one is for sample, using that overlay.

Hope, they will be usefull.
